website_summaries.verdict: The spacious interior of this microwave is a benefit, but this model really stands out for its reheating and thawing capabilities.
pros: With 1250 watts of cooking power, this oven has no problem handling larger dishes, which can fit easily in the large interior
The highlight of this model is the accurate power settings offered by the inverter technology
This allows the user to reheat without overcooking, and to thaw frozen items without cooking them
cons: The inverter technology requires an additional cool-down period, so the fan will continue to run after use, which bothers some users

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the quietest full power microwave that I have come across. You do hear it run, but a co-worker in a cube 5 feet away from the breakroom can't hear it run. The inverter technology is really nice to vary the intensity of the heating.
customer_reviews.author: JasJ

customer_reviews.title: A great microwave. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: A great microwave. Looks great. Easy to use. REALLY powerful. I usually have to set it at a lower than max setting for most jobs except maybe warming up or boiling liquids. Even for popping corn, I have to use a lower setting. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: CalFlyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Beware, read other reviews too
customer_reviews.text: This unit ran OK for exactly 13 months (just long enough to be out of 1-year warranty.) Now starts making a horrendous buzzing sound and inside light flashes, afraid to run it after a few tries so we're giving up and getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ora Moose

customer_reviews.title: This microwave is perfect! It isn't too loud and cooks the microwaveable ...
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is perfect! It isn't too loud and cooks the microwaveable food to perfection. My wife and i especially like the sleek exterior which fits our modern kitchen well. The inside disk rotates well and all sides of the food being prepared get cooked evenly. I have also used it to defrost frozen food as well and it did a good job. It seems to be an electricity saver as well compared to our old microwave which guzzled it up. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Holland

customer_reviews.title: It ran with the door open
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and figured this was the microwave I wanted. I first put a cup of water in to boil which it did as it should have. When the alarm beeped microwave kept running. I open the door and it continued to run. This was quite scary. I tried it again and the same thing happened. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: brutschman

customer_reviews.title: Keep The Box!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on 1/24/19. Today is 3/24/19. I had a Sharp Carousel microwave for years before it had to be replaced. Thought I would try the Toshiba due to Inverter Technology. WRONG! This is another E-5 problem which seems to be prevalent based on prior reviews. I had kept the box for 1 month thinking that everything would be fine after that time. I have contacted Toshiba for resolution. Let's see how long it takes. Maybe they should think about advance replacements on returns since this seems to be an on-going problem until they can QA it. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Microwave Ever
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail last night after doing a lot of research. The microwave is perfect in every way. It's quiet, it reheats food perfectly without crispy edges or cold spots, and it's super easy to clean. I really like the ability to turn off the sound so you can really only slightly hear the motor running as a faint hum. The only thing that took a minute to get used to was the fan running after being used, but all in all I couldn't have hoped for a better microwave, especially for the price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk....be warned.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave came nicely packaged. It worked well for about 3 days then all of sudden stopped working and displayed error code E-5 on display. I also noticed a burned rubber odor. Frankly, this is my 3rd microwave replacement from Amazon...very bad experience altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: It looks dirty and I am concerned that there is a problem ...
customer_reviews.text: When cooking with this microwave, condensation collects between the door and the glass. I spoke with a representative from Amazon, he said his own microwave also has a problem with condensation. It looks dirty and I am concerned that there is a problem with the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn h.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in Nov 2018, Other than being VERY loud (and the loud fan runs long after cooking has stopped) it seem to work really well, then in early May 2019. it just simply stopped working. the screen will display a code that says "E-5" and there is nothing in the owner's manual that explains the codes. I have a call into support, but I'm not holding my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is surprisingly quiet. The fan only runs when there's too much moisture inside, and it will keep running until it's dry even when cooking is finished. I don't have to worry about too much moisture or smell left in the microwave and had to leave the door open anymore. The only disappointment is this microwave still operate the door by the handle instead of push button like all other high end microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Jake The Snake!!

customer_reviews.title: Kills my wifi connections every time it gets turned on. Leaky!
customer_reviews.text: I think my title says it all. EVERY time someone uses the microwave I can't communicate with my wifi. This happens on both my and my wife's phone and a laptop when we are in the kitchen. The WIFI router and the microwave are probably 35 feet apart. The really bad part is my home office is on a different floor of the house about 25 feet away from the microwave and it loses it's connection also. The microwave isn't even close to or between either one. I'm getting a new microwave before this thing cooks my eyeballs. This thing must leak like a sieve.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is the best I have ever owned. It does a lot of different things different than most microwaves. I make pecan brittle for my brother all the time and the more powerful microwave, the better. This one really does a great job and it is very quick. It has a fan that does not shut off immediately when you are done, but it does not stay on long. That does not bother me. The fact I can control the power to melt chocolate or butter is a plus for me. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This died in 9 months. My previous, cheaper and smaller microwave lasted 12+ years before this one! I sent an email/called bc my one year warranty is still in effect and no one will help. Just don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hughes

customer_reviews.title: No Owner's Manual/Warranty/Information
customer_reviews.text: I assume that this microwave works fine, but I don't really know. I don't really know because it didn't come with an owner's manual. So, I really don't know how to work it. I mean, it is pretty self-explanatory because it is a microwave and not a space shuttle, but still, it would be nice to know how to set the clock, how to use the microwave's features, and to know exactly what I am doing. Right now I just put food in there and start pressing buttons. OK, but not ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again. House guests impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Smart looking. Easy to use. Decided -- for our household -- the pull handle more stylish, more reliable, than push button to open! Like the inverter technology!
customer_reviews.author: "Edward Z" in Maryland!

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: It worked 2 1/2 months now has E5 error code doesn’t work no return No response from Amazon no help piece of crap toshiba knows about problem and apparently doesn’t care because they keep making them Thanks for nothing. Won’t buy toshiba products ever again
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Three better be the limit
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that I am going to receive my third unit, if that one fails, I will never buy another Toshiba product of any kind again. Placed 1st on order, received and didn't work, placed order for replacement, received, doesn't work, now waiting for third to arrive, if I am lucky three will be the charm. That said can't tell you a thing about the quality, wouldn't heat up a cup of water. I know the old saying doing the same thing again and again is acting like and idiot, I just got caught up in the thrill of the adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mather

customer_reviews.title: failure after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Just had a similar issue. Was microwaving rice in a microwave safe bowl like many other times and it just died. It actually popped my outlet breaker button. I pushed the little button back in, plugged it back in, and nothing... Just dead. I then plugged in a couple of other appliances thinking that it was my wall plug. Nope, they all worked fine. I then moved the microwave to a different wall outlet and it is just straight up dead. No errors, nothing. I made the purchase 12/06/18 so it lasted less than 3 months. This is of course beyond the amazon return period and product support period. Now I have to call some 1-800 number. fun times.
customer_reviews.author: Longshot133

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this microwave !
customer_reviews.text: Good looking microwave,but didn't last even 6 months. It made a popping noise and started sparking and almost caught on fire,after only heating up something for 2 minutes in a mircowave safe bowl, Pretty bumbed out that I spent that much money on a microwave that could have burned my house down !
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Grinding/scraping noise intermittently.
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 1week of limited use. It started making scraping/grinding noises Intermittently when used. The rotating plate would hesitate while turning. Apparently the gear box that turns the plate was having a binding issue. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purely disposable. Short lived.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it less than 3 months. 1 or 2 uses per day - max. It died tonight, just went black for no reason at the conclusion of heating a serving of soup in a Tupperware container. Now, I’m going to be on the phone, box it up in what, mail it to whom? Wait, let me guess I’ll pay S&H?!?! Going to the recycle center. Won’t be buying another Toshiba microwave. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over my last microwave.
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave. It’s pretty big, it’s very easy to use, and it doesn’t do anything aggravating. It has a fan that makes some noise and will run after the microwaving portion is done. Typically 10 seconds or so. It’s not loud but it’s worth noting. It’s also pretty easy to clean. I would absolutely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety Concern
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have read the reviews before purchasing. First of all I was unable to set the clock. It appears the keypad was frozen. When start was pushed a loud rattling sound was heard. The most disturbing thing was that it would not turn off...... even when the door was opened!!!!!! 😳 I had to unplug it from the wall! This can’t possibly be safe! Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Not my account!

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Features, capacity, ease of use, appearance, price, are all five star. We have had this unit in use for just under a month, with zero complaint(s). We particularly like the quick timer settings. Given the newness of our purchase, I will do an update in mid-summer.
customer_reviews.author: bruspell

customer_reviews.title: Tough Going Here.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with this. Hard to follow manual. Have owned several over the years and this one tries too hard to be different. Waste lots of time trying to get through to what use to be a simple process with our past ovens. Not a tragic purchase but would never recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: tony andrade

customer_reviews.title: Best microwave!
customer_reviews.text: The best microwave we have owned. The inverter technology ensures even heating throughout your food, rather than the usual one side scorching hot and the other side barely warmed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: This product is a scam
customer_reviews.text: There is no other way to put it. As many other buyers mine stopped working after just 13 months almost day for day after purchase. I have a little variation though: instead of the infamous E5 error I have an E6. On top of that, this microwave leaks electromagnetic waves like crazy: my connected devices lose their network connection when it runs, Bluetooth is extremely perturbed, etc. I have not tested it but I suspect it's actually leaking massive amount of microwave. Stay away from that microwave there is plenty of alternatives that are better in every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaud Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: Crazy power levels in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I have found I need to reduce suggested cook times by 25% or more. The one-touch buttons for 30 seconds, 1,2 and 3 minutes were unexpected and have become the normal way of programming. The fact that the fans continue to run after cooking stops was distracting at first, but hardly noticeable after a couple of days No stars for durability is due to the short amount of time I have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement microwave for our built in microwave. The hole in my cabinet was a different shape than the microwaves they are selling now at the stores. This microwave fit very closely so am delighted to find it. It works fine and like all microwaves is easy to clean. It cost a bit more but fit my space well.
customer_reviews.author: karenlockwood

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this Toshiba microwave until it quit working 4 months after purchasing it. I have attempted to contact Toshiba customer service but there seems to be a"technical" issue with their phone system that has lasted for weeks. I have emailed Toshiba's customer service center and not received a response. Amazonn has done nothing to help resolve this matter.... I guess I have learned my lesson on purchasing appliances online!! DON'T DO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: julie drouillard

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba EM245A5C-BS lasted just 14 months.
customer_reviews.text: Microwave stopped working. An error code appeared that was not documented in the manual or at the Toshiba web site (at least I could not find it) . Apparently other buyers experienced similar issues. I could not find an easy fix. I tried the usual things. Previously, our microwaves lasted many years. Otherwise, we were happy with it. It had many useful extra features that saved us time. A nit? The feet slipped every time the door was shut. So, I had to keep repositioning on the tile counter.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st one did not work, they sent me new one to replace, after i had to send back, hassle, second one started grinding like 1st one in 11 month's, it does not last, i thought 1st one was just a fluke, but replacement just as bad, waist of money!!! very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: BARBIE

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. Large interior. The only issue I have that I knocked a star off for is that it continues to run for 15 seconds or more after it has finished cooking. Kind of annoying. Other than that I really like this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DJ

customer_reviews.title: Higher watts make all the difference
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice have a higher watt microwave finally. It's big, but not too big, still fits on the same cart where my old small 900 watt one was. I have not experienced any of the problems mentioned in other reviews. The fan does stay on after it's finished, it seems to depend on how long it was on for. I don't find it annoying at all though. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mi2b

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 18 months - Ended with a Bang
customer_reviews.text: While using it, it made a vert loud "pop" sound and tripped the circuit. No longer functioned. Unfortunately I am out of luck on the warranty and Toshiba support is not reachable for a microwave. Strongly recommend a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Katzf

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice simple you use microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice simple you use microwave. Almost all my cooking is in this machine and it just works great...from thawing a steak to making a creamy soup...it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Microwave Oven
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and clearly a superior microwave oven than I can find in a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Backup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Does a very good job. The extra room is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Does a very good job, even with foods that dont typically microwave well. The extra room is awesome. I looked at a dozen and a half makes/models before choosing this one, but it was worth the research - this is the best choice for cost/value .
customer_reviews.author: Happy Guy

customer_reviews.title: sleek and quick
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microwave. Smaller in overall size than my previous one, yet more powerful. Not sure what the infrared feature does, but motor continues to "run" after cooking time stops. (Kind of like a convection fan)
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Who knows? First experience like this.
customer_reviews.text: Had for until 2 days after was able to be returned and it quit working. No fire, no indication of a problem, just doesn't turn on. Unable to get any help. Thanks had to give up and toss out. Looked like new product, stolen from trash. Hope they get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not that durable
customer_reviews.text: It is a great microwave, really quiet and heats up fast and evenly. It took a bit to get used to the fans cooling it down after it is done cooking, but it’s still much quieter than any other microwave I’ve ever had. The bad part is that it took less than one month for the buttons to bubble and peel the start and stop button are already worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: love it never knew what a new microwave could do
customer_reviews.text: love it never knew what a new microwave could do. so much faster then old one. love the one touch start, popcorn, reheat buttons.
customer_reviews.author: k.bunton

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this microwave and the first one I received was used and broken. I contacted Amazon and they sent me a replacement (actual brand new one) right away. This microwave heats quickly and cleans up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: spalik

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new microwave and wanted a bigger size and better quality. I got it. It's heating up my food in less time and more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: tiredmom

customer_reviews.title: Fast, faster, fastest
customer_reviews.text: One kick ass oven, does everything you always wanted a microwave to do. However you must feed it all all the current it wants then the rewards come. No BS here!
customer_reviews.author: AReview4U

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1.5 months, then death! Sad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it January 17th, died March 11th. Using it to warm up some leftovers and it just quit. No noises. No smoke. No electrical issues. Just D-E-A-D. Won't turn on or make any attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Never buy it! Ignore star rating!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product . My return date is closed and it is not functioning as it should. On each use the clock goes to 00.00 and has to be reset to use again. Will never buy again!!! Extremely unhappy! My only recourse is to buy a new machine. This product is a shoddy made machine!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie J Powell

customer_reviews.title: This microwave is trash.
customer_reviews.text: We got our invertech microwave and have had it for about a month now we only kept it this long because we were hoping we were just using it wrong and that was why our food wasn't getting warm. As it turns out this microwave is just trash that belongs in a dump and not in your kitchen since we kept it so long we have now passed the deadline to send it back and essentially have an expensive paperweight in our kitchen taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Giesking

customer_reviews.title: It has a handle
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it has a handle. We couldn’t find one anywhere with a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Douthitt

customer_reviews.title: nice size
customer_reviews.text: Our old microwave decided to go to smoking. SO we figured it time to replace our 13year old Sharp. This Toshiba is very comfortable. Cooks quick. Easy to read time settings.. I hope it lasts 13 years like the old Sharp did. Very pleased with the purchase. We have several Toshiba appliances pleased with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had for about one month now and no problems. There is a difference between the timer and the cook timer. The timer is just to set your time just like on a oven. The cook timer is for setting like 8 min cook time than start. Good product so far looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: David A Osswald

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave. But needs rubber feet because it slides around on our granite counter tops.
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. Quiet, good looking, and easy to use. It needs rubber feet because it slides around on our granite counter tops when opening the door. I fixed it by removing feet and adding rubber feet.
customer_reviews.author: Theora

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ordeedr this microwave Which was defective and had to be returned within the 1st 2 weeks. Got the 2nd microwave which was a replacement it lasted one year and then had an E5 code and did not heat anything any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Want to exchange as it stopped working suddenly after 6 months. Cannot find any info on how to do this. We need a microwave like everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda  Wade

customer_reviews.title: one year and nothing more
customer_reviews.text: microwave failed 13 months after purchase. One year and it quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. Works great just know popcorn burns. You might have to tend this microwave on popcorn but everything else I have cooked works great. Would recommend this if you want powerful.
customer_reviews.author: S Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment and had to return
customer_reviews.text: Would stop after 2 or 3 senconds but the fan kept running and even kept running when the door was opened. Dont buy this microwave invest into a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!  Poor quality.  Worked for about a month before it died
customer_reviews.text: This microwave worked long enough to outlast Amazon's return policy. After a month, it would trip the breaker for the kitchen when you pressed the start button. Evidently it had developed a dead short internally. Amazon did allow me to return it but charged a $30 restocking fee even though I had already purchased a replacement unit from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cline

customer_reviews.title: Works nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It's basic as can be for the price.. the inverter technology is nothing special.. it does the job but not the best microwave I have had. Go with a sharp carosel. Those are fantastic had those all my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a great microwave
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for over three weeks. I knew in one week that this was a great product. Easy touch panel. Ability to turn off the beeper sound is great. It is easy to clean and has a large turntable. I like the handle rather than the push open type. I really do like this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Noland

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this December 20th 2018 and a week after it's one year anniversary it just stopped working. Wont turn on no matter where I plug it in. Was a great microwave until this. Now I'm out a microwave. Hoping someonecan help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase something else
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was defective and I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: William neville

customer_reviews.title: microwave died 10 days after the support eligibility window
customer_reviews.text: Microwave worked great for the first three months, then just stopped working. Everytime we would try to use it, it would flip the circuit breaker so I'm assuming there's a short in it. Unfortunately, this happened on the 24th and the support eligibility window closed on the 14th. I would NOT recommend this microwave to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lari leiby

customer_reviews.title: Spend $170 for a microwave that lasts two months
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the microwave January 31 2019, the microwave stopped working yesterday April 24, 2019. So happy to have spent over $170 for a microwave that lasted a little over two months. Definitely will never purchase another Toshiba microwave in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & good features
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for abt 2 mths. Toshiba good to work with on replacement/refund. Will get a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microwave! Cooks evenly and they even made the popcorn button work perfectly. I just have to get use to pushing the 'cook' button before entering the time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few months and it makes an insufferable groaning noise on a regular basis. Has something to do with the turn table. Still heats fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Check all reviews for purchasing anything
customer_reviews.text: It looks sharp but never got a chance to even try using it one time every 23 seconds it would show an E-5 on the panel and would continue to run and would not shut off unless it was unplugged never work never heated for 23 seconds it was on totally useless and a waste of time and money buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: lewmcintyre

customer_reviews.title: NOT YOUR ORDINARY MICROWAVE
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this thing very stylish, it is an awesome machine for reheating and other endeavours.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: I love how quiet this is when your microwavi g something.. but the fan stays on for a min or so after it finish
customer_reviews.author: Bmc

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase a Toshiba microwave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in April 2019 and it’s now November 2019 and it is broke not operating with an error code that is not readily available with the documents provided
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this microwave
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it once. Now just outside window of a year it broke again. Some type of electrical problem. It smelled like an electrical fire and has a big black burn mark.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few months.  E-5 Error code.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I too received the E-5 error code after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Cannot run over three minutes without it shutting off.
customer_reviews.text: The microwave shuts off if you try to run it for more than three minutes. The fan also runs for about 2 minutes after it stops always. It has to be the worst microwave I've ever purchased/used. I would NOT recommend anyone purchase this product. Just do yourself a favor and avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pogue

customer_reviews.title: Bad !
customer_reviews.text: Would absolutely not recommend this product, we just installed it in our new home and worked for 5 weeks and blew up. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Freida Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not working from day one
customer_reviews.text: first time I plug it in and turned it on it would not shut off just kept running then it had an error code 5 I never got to use it Just out of box and not working.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: The same model is no longer available, but I know the new one that I want.
customer_reviews.text: This Microwave has become “Faulty”. It does not heat the same anymore & the interior light is “on the blink”. I purchased a “SquareTrade 4-Year Protection Plan“ for it. I wish to “Exchange For Another”. Please respond on Necessary Procedure for Replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jim Burns

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works only for a few weeks then dies. I had it replaced once and the new one died 2 months after i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Flint

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Received this 2 days ago to replace my 3 year old Panasonic that died abruptly. For the money, you can't beat the Toshiba. It cooks as well as the more expensive Panasonic. Nice looking and I love the light which is bright enough to see what is going on inside.
customer_reviews.author: Occy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Defective, poor quality, common failure with most models means it is a product issue.
customer_reviews.text: Why did it only work for 4 months before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: it was very easy to learn how to use the item,works great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: The microwave just died after 15 months of use. Don't waste your money on such an inferior product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: defective key pad
customer_reviews.text: Protective cover on key board is peeling, bubbling, after so little use. Is there a fix for this defect?
customer_reviews.author: Brian H. Leachman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Microwave died one day after the cut off to send it back. Please don't buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Grover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice appliance and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the inverter feature, it’s quiet, and looks nice. For out family of 4 it’s just the right size for leftovers or what ever.
customer_reviews.author: Koreena Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs a better instruction manual . Memory and power level are confusing the way it is explain..
customer_reviews.author: Abrick

customer_reviews.title: Why I am unhappy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The microwave makes a loud noise when the turntable goes around. I tried to adjust the glass plate and the plastic rollers under the glass plate but the noise is loud and won't stop. This is very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Having to buy another 4 months later!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago and now I am having to buy a new one. The one I got in August has started to spark and has a burning smell to it. NOT safe to use anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerfull
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the led light on the inside. The clear plastic covering over the membrane switches is showing wear after a couple of months of use. The unit is lite, it moves around when you pull the door open.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joe Average

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very much enjoying my microwave. Easy to use and perfect for my needs which are mainly defrosting and reheating. Like many others, I love the door handle.Attractive black stainless finish.
customer_reviews.author: Emelda

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, quiet and easy to use. Looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Heats anything in 30 seconds. Water or other liquids ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats anything in 30 seconds. Water or other liquids in 15. If you want things scorching hot a minute will do.
customer_reviews.author: William Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: works great and heats a lot better than my last microwave, very simple to use and the inside size is very spacious, outside size doesn't take that much room either.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Delahunt

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cooks dishes all the way through. +30 secs perfect for beverages. 3 levels for popcorn bag sizes awesome. Roomy inside but not huge outside. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 5 months in
customer_reviews.text: Megatron unit gave up 5 months in with light use..... wouldnt purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love the sensor cook feature and the fact that it is very sturdy and cleans up beautifully. I would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Uhl

customer_reviews.title: I bought it on Feb 12,  2020 and it broke on May 28, 2020
customer_reviews.text: a brand new micro wave it worked 3 months and quit working today May 28, 2020. junk product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and clean. Nice for reheating left overs. Some foods turn out good when cooked in this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Kaynetta Calander

customer_reviews.title: It died in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The power is on, but it gives me a code E-6 and wont do anything!
customer_reviews.author: John O.

product_meta.title: Toshiba EM245A5C-BS Microwave Oven with Inverter Technology, LCD Display and Smart Sensor, 1.6 Cu.ft/1250W, Black Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Black Stainless Steel| Size:1.6 Cu.ft| Style Name:InverterThis Toshiba 1.6 Cubic feet 1200 watt Black Stainless Steel microwave with Inverter features innovative cooking technology and a spacious interior. The Inverter technology provides even heating and defrosting so you get great results without overcooking. Sensor buttons let you optimally cook six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose from ten power levels up to 1200 watts. The large digital display has a clock function and can also display a countdown timer as well as the cooking time remaining. Program up to three favorite time and power combinations for additional one-touch convenience. Easily open or close the microwave with the large, easy-to grip door handle. The Black Stainless Steel exterior looks good in any kitchen.
feature_bullets: Stylish Black Stainless Steel with timeless design, external Dimension (wdh): 21. 819. 213 inches, internal Dimension (wdh): 15. 51710. 2 inches
Inverter technology provides even heating and defrosting, enables faster cooking and more satisfying user experience
Pre-programmed sensor menu for optimum heating of popular foods like pizza, potato, vegetables and more
One touch popcorn button and quick access to start the microwave from 1 to 3 minutes cooking at full power
1250 watts with 10 power settings, clock and kitchen timer, equipped with power-saving eco mode, sound on/off option and child safety lock
Bright digital display, easy-to-read control panel, LED cavity light and 13. 6 inches glass turntable
The keypad was covered by a protection film during the shipment. Please Peel it off before your first use.
If you wish to mute the buzzer of the microwave, pleas long press on the button "8" For 3-5 seconds. The buzzer is automatically switched off after a long beep.
1 year, Please keep the packaging for contacting Toshiba After sales service And product returns.
